views.markdown:
Added support for iOS 9. -Added iOS 8+ Compatibility
-Added the ability to delete gaps that are found between the cells.
-Added the ability to insert gaps above a cell after you press on it's green plus button
-Added the ability to install and delete tweaks without the order resetting. The new tweak cells will be added to the end of the settings table, under a section titled: Unordered Cells
-Fixed bugs including a bug that caused the cells' width to be resized into the smaller iPhone 4 size.
